div1.p: UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT OF THE WESTER DISTRICTOF WASHINGTON, NORTHERN DIVISION.
IN THE MATTER OF THE APPLICATION of CHARLES M. HELMORE FOR A WRIT OF HABEAS CORPUS. ORDER NO. 3385

THIS MATTER coming on for hearing this _____ day of _____, 1916, and the court being fully advised in the premises; it is hereby ORDERED, ADJUDGED and DECREED, that a Writ of Habeas Corpus issue under the seal of this Court, directed to John Boyle, U.S.Marshall for the Western District of Washington, to produce the body of Charles M. Helmore, before this Court, on the 19th day of July, 1916, at the hour of 1:45 o'clock pm and then and there show by what author ity in law, he is holding the said Charles M. Helmore, and depriving him of his liberty.
DONE IN OPEN COURT THIS 18 DAY OF JULY, 1916.
IN THE SuperiorDistrict COURT OF THE STATEWestern District of Washington, North Devision
In the Matter of the Application of Charles M. Helmore for a Writ of Habeas Corpus
FILED IN THE U.S. District Court, Western Dist. of Washington, Northern Division JUL 18 1916 FRANK L. CROSBY, Clerk By Deputy
